amendment.description: Page 8, line 23, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $30,000,000)". Page 22, line 17, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $30,000,000)".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Grothman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
